Stixbox Function

NAME

    rexpweib - Random numbers from the exponential or weibull distributions

CALLING SEQUENCE

x=rexpweib(n,l,a)

PARAMETERS

    • n : positive integer or vector [lig,col] of integers
    • l : positive real
    • a : Weibull parameter (default a=1: exponential dist.)
    • x : n-vector of random numbers chosen from a weibull distribution

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the exponential or weibull distributions 

     F(x) = 1-exp[-(l*x)^a]
